content: i first shared a kinzie design four years ago ~ the kinzie baby top later i added instructions for matching hats rompers and a little all-in-one i know that many knitters have enjoyed the range of kinzie patterns - the design is easy to knit and always looks so cute here is my latest version ~ a baby cardigan with a button-front & long or short sleeves worked from the top down - and easy to knit newborn 0 - 3 months 6 - 9 months 9 - 12 months requires ~ dk yarn light worsted 8ply 4mm needles 6 small buttons a lovely unisex pattern i hope you enjoy it **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
